ygData.subject: Re: Divine aura or divine barrier
ygData.msgSnippet: I generally use only Divine Aura, cause it casts faster.  In dangerous areas, I will mem both of them, using Barrier as a back up. Mik ... From: Woland
ygData.messageBody:
I generally use only Divine Aura, cause it casts faster. In dangerous
areas, I will mem both of them, using Barrier as a back up.

Mik
----- Original Message -----
From: Woland Grauensturm <woland@...>
To: <EQ-Clerics@onelist.com>
Sent: Wednesday, October 06, 1999 10:22 AM
Subject: [EQ-Clerics] Divine aura or divine barrier


> From: Woland Grauensturm <woland@...>
>
>
> I just reached level 29 and tested divine barrier. I am a bit
disappointed.
> I noticed that divine barrier lasts for around 22 secs while divine aura
> lasts for some 20 secs. Divine barrier also restores some HPs, I was
> standing and noticed around 50 hit points regenerated.
>
> But 100 mana!?! That is a lot of mana in an emergency. Can the rest of you
> clerics please give me advice. What do you prefer to use after level 29?
>
> // JS
>
>
